Author: TheArcane43
Name: Substat Tiers
Description: Gives a detailed table of how your substats work. Includes substat tiering, substat effects, and potential tier gains on materia.
Punchline: Shows how substats tier and what effects you get from them.
Changelog:
Updated substat tables to show GCD tiers.
Added potential materia bonuses table.
Updated config file: you can choose which tables are displayed.
